code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link,useLocation,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../../contexts/AuthContext';import{useTheme}from'../../contexts/ThemeContext';import StudentSidebar from'./StudentSidebar';import StudentNavbar from'./StudentNavbar';import{FaBars,FaTimes}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StudentLayout=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[sidebarOpen,setSidebarOpen]=useState(false);const{user,logout}=useAuth();const{darkMode}=useTheme();const location=useLocation();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogout=()=>{logout();navigate('/login');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen ".concat(darkMode?'dark bg-gray-900':'bg-gray-50'),children:[sidebarOpen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fixed inset-0 z-40 lg:hidden",onClick:()=>setSidebarOpen(false),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"absolute inset-0 bg-gray-600 opacity-75"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fixed inset-y-0 left-0 z-50 w-64 transform transition-transform duration-300 ease-in-out lg:translate-x-0 ".concat(sidebarOpen?'translate-x-0':'-translate-x-full'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StudentSidebar,{onClose:()=>setSidebarOpen(false)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"lg:ml-64 flex flex-col min-h-screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StudentNavbar,{onMenuClick:()=>setSidebarOpen(!sidebarOpen),user:user,onLogout:handleLogout}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"flex-1 p-6",children:children})]})]});};export default StudentLayout;
